title: Taurus
description:
Drug addict. Lazy. Useless. Drunk. Names that my siblings called me. Seeker of Truth. That's what I preferred to be known as.  When our arch enemy Nick offered me the opportunity to go back in time to see why we had become obsessed with hunting each other down, I couldn't refuse.  When I agreed, what I thought were hallucinations took over. The past would not only answer questions about my life, it would reveal who Nick was too.  
The Zodiac Twin Flame series is a twelve book young adult paranormal romance series.
author: Rachel Medhurst
